column5: Has anyone tried trolling at higher speeds 5-8mph with it. If so was there any issues with it leveling?
What size trebles would you use?
a bit expensive but Xmas is coming  or make one

Dang that looks cool I will look into one some day I like the idea of making one but would be afraid of loosing my camera. All though I would be trolling right beside the boat watching a down rod.  Thanks for the ideas maybe I will head to the hard where store any way and see what they have.
